mapper.select: SELECT a.iboard, a.title, a.created_at, b.nm writer, b.main_pic writerMainPic FROM t_board a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser ORDER BY iboard DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${rowLen}

SELECT a.iboard, a.title, a.ctnt, a.created_at createdAt ,a.updated_at updatedAt, b.nm writer, b.main_pic writerMainPic FROM t_board a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
